ygData.subject: Re: Verant ruined the revive line of spellsy
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There was a lot oif stuff evidently nerfed by this last patch. Druids are complaining about the doubling of our succor spells. ... Hey! At least you can
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 29 Jul 1999, Mystik wrote:

> From: Mystik <mystik@...>

> o i agree...it totally SUX........not only do they lower the dmg our best
> dd does by at least 50 points...<those 50 points make a difference...i was

There was a lot oif stuff evidently "nerfed" by this last patch.
Druids are complaining about the doubling of our succor spells.

> and don't get me started on the no cleric only weapons......that and the
> fact that we can't wear all mithril like warriors or pallies....only
> thing we can wear is the bp and the bracers...no sleeves, no greeves.....
> what gives? it's all plate claases EXCEPT for clerics

Hey! At least you can wear some of it. Druids are left off of all the
plate in the first place. See a newbie character in a high dungeon?
Chances are, its a druid :)

And druids don't get druid-only weapons either.
